org.jnosql.diana.api

Interface SettingsEncryption

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsymmetricSettingsEncryption, SymmetricSettingsEncryption

    public interface SettingsEncryption
    This instance will encrypt and decrypt properties of Settings. To set the encryption, put the value on the property: Configurations.ENCRYPTION. The value is the Class.getName() from implementation and might define from SettingsPriority, in other words, the same priority from Eclipse MicroProfile Configuration and JSR 382. Where the when sets the value: "symmetric" it will return SymmetricSettingsEncryption and symmetric it will return AsymmetricSettingsEncryption. To enable the property encryption put the value in the "ENC(value)";
